revised_title: Botanicum Hortense IV: A Collection of Rare Plants Observed in Gardens around London and Chelsea Physick-Garden
tldr: This article provides a detailed account of various rare plants observed in gardens around London and the Chelsea Physick-Garden, including their descriptions, taxonomy, and classification. The author, James Petiver, also discusses the origins and characteristics of these plants, making it a valuable resource for botanists and gardeners alike.
